name: MonTowers2
description:
◆◇The Hit Game App Returns!!!◇◆
『MonTowers2』 is the sequel to the hit smatrphone app 『MonTowers ~Legend of Summoners~』 released in 2012.

《 Various Events 》
There are events every month where you can acquire unique Monsters!
Check regularly for event information within the app or through official SNS channels!

《 Simple Rules to Play 》
Form a party with 3 Monsters and climb to the top of the Tower, beating every enemy in your way!
MonTowers2 is a Role-Playing Game in which you can collect, summon and strengthen your Monsters!

▶ Check Coupon Event for all summoners : https://www.facebook.com/montowers2 ◀

《 Story 》
One peaceful day in Alspiria, mysterious Towers suddenly appeared from underneath the ground.
To regain peace to the land of Alspiria, the Monster summoners head out on a new journey.
